variant.p: A financial asset and a financial liability shall be offset and the net amount presented in the statement of financial position when, and only when, an entity:

li.p: currently has a legally enforceable right to set off the recognised amounts; and
intends either to settle on a net basis, or to realise the asset and settle the liability simultaneously.

variant.p: In accounting for a transfer of a financial asset that does not qualify for derecognition, the entity shall not offset the transferred asset and the associated liability (see IFRS 9, paragraph 3.2.22).
